Description.Text: The Special Class Hotel is like a colorful page from different ages of history reflecting both art and the rich cultural heritage of modern Turkey. The hotel will be pleased to serve you in the home not as a customer but as a guest with a great Turkish hospitality. Whether you choose to stay in the hotel or not, hotel wishes you a pleasent holiday in beautiful city, Turkey... Warmest regards, Sirkeci Park Hotel "Where the time stands straight..."! Hotel's architecture is based on the classical OttomanPark style . Sirkeci Park is located right at the center of the historical peninsula of the Istanbul . Being a guest in the hotel is an experience of Turkish and Ottoman hosting tradition. The hotel also provides dry cleaning, lobby and reception in amenity.

Sirkeci Park Hotel, Istanbul is well located in the heart of old city, Eminonu. Hotel mark all the historical places in the old historical peninsula with their walking distances. 1) Topkapi Palace 6 MIN 2) St. Sophia Museum5 MIN 3) Turkish & Islamic Art Museum8 MIN 4) Archeological Museum2 MIN 5) Tile Museum4 MIN 6) Saint Irene 6 MIN 7) Mosaic Museum 13 MIN, 8) Carpet Museum13 MIN 9) Basilica Cistern 4 MIN 10) Grand Bazaar10 MIN, 11) Spice Bazaar 4 MIN 12) Sultanahmet Square 5MIN 13) Dolmabahce Palace10 MIN. 14) Neve Shalom Sinagog 17MIN 15) Tophane Fountain 15MIN 16) GalataTower 10 MIN 17) Old Jewish Quarter 30 MIN 18) Kariye Museum 30 MIN 19) FenerOrthodoxPatriarchate 20 MIN 20) Fatih Mosque20MIN 21) Bozdogan Aqueduct15 MIN 22) New Mosque 3 MIN 23) Tomb of Architec Sinan10 MIN 24) Tomb of Suleyman The Magnificent15 MIN 25) Beyazt Tower15MIN.

Double/Twin Room - Double/Twin Room offers one French bed or two twin beds with air conditioning, alarm clock, balcony / terrace, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, ceiling fan, clothes dryer, color TV, en-suite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, free wireless internet access, iron / ironing board, kettle, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, radio, refrigerator, room service, safe in room, tea and coffee making facilities and telephone. The room also provides shower cabine and wake up service.
Triple - Room - Triple Room offers one French bed and one twin bed with air conditioning, alarm clock, balcony / terrace, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, ceiling fan, clothes dryer, color TV, en-suite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, free wireless internet access, iron / ironing board, kettle, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, radio, refrigerator, room service, safe in room, tea and coffee making facilities and telephone. The room also provides shower cabine and wake up service.
Single - Room - Single Room offers one French bed with air conditioning, alarm clock, balcony / terrace, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, ceiling fan, clothes dryer, color TV, en-suite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, free wireless internet access, iron / ironing board, kettle, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, radio, refrigerator, room service, safe in room, tea and coffee making facilities and telephone. The room also provides shower cabine and wake up service.
